# streamlit_slb_gallery

Streamlit component that allows user display images and video gallery

## Installation instructions

```sh
pip install streamlit_slb_gallery
```

## Release Notes

  1.0.1

  1.0.2

- Fix load card issue

  1.0.4

  1.0.5
